root.message: The COVERAGE field for indicator 8-2-1, translated into en
root.data:
Data Availability: Data for this indicator is available for 188 countries and territories.

Time series:

Data for this indicator is available as of 2000 in the SDG Indicators Global Database, but time series going back to 1991 and including estimates up to 2019 are available in ILOSTAT.

Disaggregation:

No disaggregation required for this indicator.
